Package com.example.carturestibackend.services

Class PromotionService

java.lang.Object
com.example.carturestibackend.services.PromotionService
@Service public class PromotionService extends Object
Service class to handle business logic related to promotions.

      public List<PromotionDTO> findPromotions()
      Retrieves all promotions from the database.
      Returns:

    • findPromotionById

      public PromotionDTO findPromotionById(String id)
      Retrieves a promotion by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the promotion to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The PromotionDTO object representing the retrieved promotion.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the promotion with the specified ID is not found.

    • insert

      Inserts a new promotion into the database.
      Parameters:
      promotionDTO - The PromotionDTO object representing the promotion to insert.
      Returns:

    • deletePromotionById

      public void deletePromotionById(String id)
      Deletes a promotion from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the promotion to delete.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the promotion with the specified ID is not found.

    • updatePromotion

      public PromotionDTO updatePromotion(String id, PromotionDTO promotionDTO)
      Updates an existing promotion in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the promotion to update.
      promotionDTO - The updated PromotionDTO object representing the new state of the promotion.
      Returns:
      The updated PromotionDTO object.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the promotion with the specified ID is not found.
